hero.title: Silver without defined edges.
hero.subtitle: Each piece starts as a pause. We map negative space, sketch air, and let recycled silver wrap around the absence until the gesture feels calm.
hero.quote: Nirakara is meditation for the hands. The surfaces stay raw so the wearer can feel the rhythm of the studio.

featured.heading: Limited objects from the Nirakara archive.
featured.summary: Released in deliberate batches. Each form is catalogued with its own signal number and log note.

newsletter.heading: Stay synced with the studio cadence.
newsletter.body: Receive drop timings, research notes, and invites to closed ritual demonstrations. No noise, only calm transmissions.
newsletter.footnote: We send transmissions only when something meaningful emerges.
